text: Tomás Alexis Oneto (born 19 February 1998) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a defender for S.D. Aucas, on loan from Talleres. ==Career== Oneto began his senior career with Talleres, a team he spent his youth career with; featuring for the U20s at the 2018 U-20 Copa Libertadores in Uruguay, making three appearances. He left the club on loan in July 2018, joining Istra 1961 of the Croatian First Football League. Oneto's debut arrived on 12 August during a 3–0 defeat against Osijek. Eleven more matches followed. In January 2019, Oneto switched Croatia for Spain by agreeing a move to Tercera División side Alavés B.
